mapper.select: SELECT A.shikibetsukodo AS 識別コード, A.hokenshabango AS 保険者番号, A.hihokenjabango AS 被保険者番号, A.ninteishinseibi AS 認定申請日, A.edaban AS 枝番, A.shinseikubunhorei AS 申請区分_法令_コード, A.shinseikubunshinseiji AS 申請区分_申請時_コード, A.torisakubunkodo AS 取下区分コード, A.hihokenjakubun AS 被保険者区分コード, A.shinseidaikokubun AS 申請代行区分コード, A.seinengappi AS 生年月日, A.nenrei AS 年齢, A.seibetsukodo AS 性別コード, A.hihokenjakanashimei AS 被保険者ｶﾅ氏名, A.hihokenjakanjishimei AS 被保険者漢字氏名, A.yubenbango AS 郵便番号, A.jusho AS 住所, A.tenwabango AS 電話番号, A.byoinshisetsutonomeisho AS 病院施設等の名称, A.byoinshisetsutonoshozaichi AS 病院施設等の所在地, A.zenkainoninteishinsakaikekka AS 前回の認定審査会結果, A.zenkainoninteiyukokigenkaishi AS 前回の認定有効期間_開始, A.zenkainoninteiyukokigenshuryo AS 前回の認定有効期間_終了, A.shujiiiryokikanbango AS 主治医医療機関番号, A.shujiibango AS 主治医番号, A.lkenshoiraibi AS 意見書依頼日, A.lkenshonyushubi AS 意見書入手日, A.lkensho_tankikioku AS 意見書_短期記憶, A.lkensho_ninchinoryoku AS 意見書_認知能力, A.lkensho_dentatsunoryoku AS 意見書_伝達能力, A.lkensho_shokujikoi AS 意見書_食事行為, A.lkensho_ninshishokoreishajiritsudo AS 意見書_認知症高齢者の日常生活自立度, A.chosairaibi AS 調査依頼日, A.chosajisshibi AS 調査実施日, A.shiteikyotakukaigoshienjigyoshatobango AS 指定居宅介護支援事業者等番号, A.ltakukubun AS 委託区分, A.ninteichosainbango AS 認定調査員番号, A.ninteichosainshikakukodo AS 認定調査員資格コード, A.lchijihanteibi AS 一次判定日, A.lchijihanteikekka AS 一次判定結果, A.lchijihanteikekka_ninshishokasan AS 一次判定結果_認知症加算, A.ninteishinsakaishiryosakuseibi AS 認定審査会資料作成日, A.ninteishinsakaiyoteibi AS 認定審査会予定日, A.gogitaibango AS 合議体番号, A.shinsakaishiryobango AS 審査会資料番号, A.nijihanteibi AS 二次判定日, A.nijihanteikekka AS 二次判定結果, A.ninteiyukokigen_kaishi AS 認定有効期間_開始, A.ninteiyukokigen_shuryo AS 認定有効期間_終了, A.tokuteishippeikodo AS 特定疾病コード, A.yokaigo1nobaainojotaizo AS 要介護1の場合の状態像, A.genzainosabisukubunkodo AS 現在のサービス区分コード, A.genzainojokyo AS 現在の状況 FROM "FairudetaIchijiTeburuTemp" AS A
